metadata.title: CVE-2021-36417 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in GPAC v1.0.1 in the gf_isom_dovi_config_get function in MP4Box, which causes a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
